data.name: Before_You_Start_Text
data.value: Before you start

data.name: Caption_This_Section_IsFor
data.value: This service is for awarding organisations and providers who deliver T Level qualifications.

data.name: Collapsable_Awarding_Organisation_Service_Roles
data.value: Awarding organisation service roles

data.name: Collapsable_Provider_service_Roles
data.value: Provider service roles

data.name: Heading_AwardingOrganisation_Can_Use_Service_To
data.value: Awarding organisations (also known as exam boards) can use this service to:

data.name: Heading_Provider_Can_Use_Service_To
data.value: Providers (for example, schools and colleges) can use this service to:

data.name: Learner_Records_Editors_Role
data.value: Learner Records Editor

data.name: Learner_Records_Editors_Role_Info
data.value: – can upload, amend, view, delete and add English and maths achievements and update industry placement completion status

data.name: Link_Tlevel_Results_UserGuide
data.value: Manage T Level results user guide

data.name: Page_Heading
data.value: Manage T Level results

data.name: Page_Title
data.value: Sign in to manage your T Level results

data.name: Para_You_Will_Be_Signed_Out
data.value: You will be signed out if you are inactive for 30 minutes.

data.name: Provider_Administrator_Role
data.value: Provider Administrator

data.name: Provider_Administrator_Role_Info
data.value: – has all roles: Learner Records Editor

data.name: Role_Providers_Editor
data.value: Providers Editor

data.name: Role_Providers_Editor_Info
data.value: – can enter and amend the T Levels each provider is offering

data.name: Role_Registrations_Editor
data.value: Registrations Editor

data.name: Role_Registrations_Editor_Info
data.value: – can upload, amend, view, remove and add learner registrations and assessment entries

data.name: Role_Results_Editor
data.value: Results Editor

data.name: Role_Results_Editor_Info
data.value: – can upload, amend, view, remove and add learners’ core component results

data.name: Role_Site_Administrator
data.value: Site Administrator

data.name: Role_Site_Administrator_Info
data.value: – has all roles: T Levels Reviewer, Providers Editor, Registrations Editor, Results Editor

data.name: Role_TLevels_Reviewer
data.value: T Levels Reviewer

data.name: Role_TLevels_Reviewer_Info
data.value: – reviews T Level Technical Qualification titles and confirms that details are correct or not

data.name: Service_Access_The
data.value: access the

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Amend_Assessments
data.value: add and amend assessment entries

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Amend_Registrations
data.value: add and amend learner registrations

data.name: Service_TellUs_Add_Amend_Results
data.value: add and amend core component results

data.name: Service_TellUs_English_And_Maths_Qualification
data.value: tell us if a learner has met the minimum standard for English and maths

data.name: Service_TellUs_IndustryPlacement_Status
data.value: tell us if a learner has completed their industry placement

data.name: Service_TellUs_Provider_Offering
data.value: tell us which T Levels each provider is offering

data.name: Service_TellUs_Tlevel_Details_Correct
data.value: tell us if T Level details are correct

data.name: Start_Button_Text
data.value: Start now

data.name: You_Need_DfE_SignIn_Account_To_Use_This_Service_Text
data.value: You will need a DfE Sign-in account and an assigned service role.
